SELECT cj.task_code prjNo, cj.contract_no contractNo, cj.contract_name contractName, cj.cc_name AS ccName , cj.contract_long_time contractLongTime, om.om_name omName, u.u_name mainPrjLeader, cj.contract_money cjmoney, cj.temporary_money temporaryMoney, case when tk.main_department like #{depart} then tk.main_department_money when tk.assist_department1 like #{depart} then tk.assist_department1_money when tk.assist_department2 like #{depart} then tk.assist_department2_money when tk.assist_department3 like #{depart} then tk.assist_department3_money else 0 end as mainDepartMoney, ppf.contract_income iall, ppf.prj_this_income_yuan ibq, bff.all_cost allCost, IFNULL(sum(cc.money2),"") leiJiChengBen, IFNULL(sum(ar.sk_queren_money),"") allKpMoney, IFNULL(sum(ar.come_all_money),"") resultMoney, CASE ms.status WHEN 1 THEN '审核中' WHEN 2 THEN '正在进行' WHEN 3 THEN '取消' WHEN 6 THEN '已完结' ELSE '' END cjStatus, IFNULL(cw.end_money,'') contractJueSuanMoney, IFNULL(fb.fb_no,'') fbNo, IFNULL(fb.contract_name,'') fbContract, IFNULL(ccfb.cc_name, '') fbYiName, IFNULL(fb.contract_money,'') nowFbAllMoney, IFNULL(fco.fb_end_money,'') fbJueSuanMoney
FROM cj_contract cj LEFT JOIN organization_management om on cj.main_department = om.om_id LEFT JOIN (select * from task left join mode_status on task.prj_id = mode_status.mode_id where history=1 and `status`=2) tk on cj.task_code = tk.prj_no LEFT JOIN user u on tk.main_engineer = u.user_id LEFT JOIN prj_progress_fill ppf on cj.task_code=ppf.task_no LEFT JOIN budget_fpplication_form bff on bff.task_no = tk.prj_no LEFT JOIN company_cost cc on cc.task_code = tk.prj_no LEFT JOIN kp_application kpa on kpa.contract_no = cj.contract_no LEFT JOIN already_renling ar on ar.c_no = cj.contract_no LEFT JOIN fb_contract fb on fb.cj_contract_code = cj.contract_no LEFT JOIN consociation_company ccfb on ccfb.cc_id = fb.contract_name_yi LEFT JOIN (select * from contract_work where type='3') cw on cw.cj_contract_code = cj.contract_no LEFT JOIN fb_contract_over fco on fco.cj_contract = cj.contract_no LEFT JOIN pay on pay.contract_no = fb.fb_no LEFT JOIN consociation_company s ON FIND_IN_SET( s.cc_id, cj.contract_name_jia ) LEFT JOIN mode_status ms ON cj.cj_id = ms.mode_id WHERE ms.`status` IN (2, 6) and cj.history=1 and (tk.main_department like #{depart} OR tk.assist_department1 like #{depart} OR tk.assist_department2 like #{depart} OR tk.assist_department3 like #{depart}) and tk.history=1 and ms.status in (2,6) GROUP BY cj.cj_id

SELECT cj.task_code prjNo, cj.contract_no contractNo, cj.contract_name contractName, cj.cc_name AS ccName , cj.contract_long_time contractLongTime, om.om_name omName, u.u_name mainPrjLeader, cj.contract_money cjmoney, cj.temporary_money temporaryMoney, case when tk.main_department like #{depart} then tk.main_department_money when tk.assist_department1 like #{depart} then tk.assist_department1_money when tk.assist_department2 like #{depart} then tk.assist_department2_money when tk.assist_department3 like #{depart} then tk.assist_department3_money else 0 end as mainDepartMoney, ppf.contract_income iall, ppf.prj_this_income_yuan ibq, bff.all_cost allCost, g.do_date as lxTime, IFNULL(sum(cc.money2),"") leiJiChengBen, IFNULL(sum(ar.sk_queren_money),"") allKpMoney, IFNULL(sum(ar.come_all_money),"") resultMoney, CASE ms.status WHEN 1 THEN '审核中' WHEN 2 THEN '正在进行' WHEN 3 THEN '取消' WHEN 6 THEN '已完结' ELSE '' END cjStatus, IFNULL(cw.end_money,'') contractJueSuanMoney, IFNULL(fb.fb_no,'') fbNo, IFNULL(fb.contract_name,'') fbContract, IFNULL(ccfb.cc_name, '') fbYiName, IFNULL(fb.contract_money,'') nowFbAllMoney, IFNULL(fco.fb_end_money,'') fbJueSuanMoney
FROM cj_contract cj LEFT JOIN organization_management om on cj.main_department = om.om_id LEFT JOIN (select * from task left join mode_status on task.prj_id = mode_status.mode_id where history=1 and `status`=2) tk on cj.task_code = tk.prj_no LEFT JOIN user u on tk.main_engineer = u.user_id LEFT JOIN prj_progress_fill ppf on cj.task_code=ppf.task_no LEFT JOIN budget_fpplication_form bff on bff.task_no = tk.prj_no LEFT JOIN company_cost cc on cc.task_code = tk.prj_no LEFT JOIN kp_application kpa on kpa.contract_no = cj.contract_no LEFT JOIN already_renling ar on ar.c_no = cj.contract_no LEFT JOIN fb_contract fb on fb.cj_contract_code = cj.contract_no LEFT JOIN consociation_company ccfb on ccfb.cc_id = fb.contract_name_yi LEFT JOIN (select * from contract_work where type='3') cw on cw.cj_contract_code = cj.contract_no LEFT JOIN fb_contract_over fco on fco.cj_contract = cj.contract_no LEFT JOIN pay on pay.contract_no = fb.fb_no LEFT JOIN consociation_company s ON FIND_IN_SET( s.cc_id, cj.contract_name_jia ) LEFT JOIN mode_status ms ON cj.cj_id = ms.mode_id LEFT JOIN(SELECT a.mode_id, a.do_date from (SELECT a.* from flowhistroy a LEFT JOIN task b ON a.mode_id=b.prj_id left join mode_status as c on a.mode_id=c.mode_id WHERE c.status='2' and a.gaibian IS NULL ORDER BY a.do_date DESC) as a GROUP BY a.mode_id) as g ON tk.prj_id=g.mode_id
cj.contract_money>=#{seachCjMoneyMin} and cj.contract_money<=#{seachCjMoneyMax} and
g.do_date>=#{seachTimeMin} and g.do_date <=#{seachTimeMax} and
